      • SaveImage

        public boolean SaveImage()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        To save file from image post in directory, This project is using C:\Documents for file location. Require to initialize post using setPost
        Returns:
        boolean - To indicate whether saving image is successful
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if any IO error while saving file

      • GetImage

        public byte[] GetImage()
                throws java.io.IOException
        To retrieve image file from directory, This project is using C:\Documents for file location. Require to initialize post using setPost
        Returns:
        byte[] - file retrieve from physical storage and converted to byte[] to return to user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if any IO error while reading file
